response.overview: A hot-shot lawyer is hired by a Hong Kong chemical plant to dispose of opposition to their polluting ways. But when he falls for a beautiful woman out to stop the plant, he is torn in a conflict of interest and asks his trusty friends Samo and Biao to help out at least until they discover the true purpose of the plant.
response.tagline: Spectacular action all the way as Jackie Chan busts a high-tech drug ring.
response.title: Dragons Forever

titles.title: Enas sifounas pou ton elegan Jackie

results.name: [Trailer] 飛龍猛將 ( Dragons Forever ) - Restored Version
